text:
@SenSchumer Hey #LyingChuck. CA resindent here. Tests are very available. Three weeks ago Mom went to the doc and was tested for COVID-19 on the spot. No waiting. Hospital- empty. Results were in the next morning. Negative. 
The only thing inadiquate is you, @SpeakerPelosi @RepAdamSchiff
